creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure holding a sword down with both hands and looking behind him, up at an owl flying near a tree; disembodied head near PR foot; image is framed by a tree on either side

title: The Fatal Bellman
